summary: Kiteretsu Daihyakka is an Action game, published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: Kitaru
summary: Kitaru is an episodic cyberpunk RPG

name: King Kong 2: Yomigaeru Densetsu
summary: A giant ape King Kong, which was shot and fell off the World Trade Center tower, appears to be alive, but is in coma for 10 years and desperately needs a blood transfusion in order to have an artificial heart implanted. Suddenly, in the rainforest, another gigantic ape is found - this time a female. She is brought to the USA, and the heart is successfully implanted. But then King Kong, having sensed the female ape, breaks loose.

name: Kinito Ninja
summary: Kinito Ninja is a white knuckle side scrolling action adventure. The player's goal is simple: run head long past obstacles, slash past enemies with your Katana, and get as much treasure as quickly as you can through sixty unique levels!

name: Kill the Dragon
summary: You are a dwarf with the most dangerous job in the land: killing dragons! Using lots of dynamite, a mining pick, and your wits you need to rid the kingdom of its dragon infestation all while collecting as much gold and jewels as you can!

name: Kiwi Farm
summary: Set in the exotic island of New Zealand, you can grow and decorate your Kiwi Vine up into the sky and harvest juicy kiwis. You will discover more surprises the higher you go.Manage your adorable kiwi friends and bees to pollinate, harvest and collect your kiwis.

name: Kingdom Clicker
summary: The king needs your help! Build the kingdom and earn money with just the tip of your finger! Try to get all the achievements by restoring wealth and honor of your empire.

name: King Kong
summary: LCD game released by Tiger Electronics and Orlitronic.

name: Kids Learn to Tell Time: What Does the Clock Say?
Kidou Senshi Gundam Extreme VS: Full Boost
King's Cup
summary: King's Cup is a drinking game played online with friends. Players each pull a card from the circle and have to drink, give drinks, or a mini-game is started to determine who should drink. King's Cup comes with default rules or you can host games using your own custom rules!

name: Kinder Pingui: Fresh Adventures
summary:
Fresh Adventures is a 2001 collection of 4 advergames all themed around the Kinder product line, developed by Ubisoft GmbH and Ferrero Germany. Released in Germany, Austria and Italy (as far as we are aware), the player takes control of "Pingui" and "Milchschnitte" and must venture forth and defeat the 4 villains of the game.
The game is seperated into 4 sub-games:
Der finsteres Dschungle (English: The Dark jungle)
Das magische Tal (English: The Magical Valley)
Der geheimnisvolle Berg (English: The Mysterious Mountain)
Die Weltraumfabrik (English: The Space Factory)

name: Kinlings
summary: Craft your tale in a whimsical fantasy world. Shape a charming city, fulfill Kinlings' needs, and watch their unique stories unfold. Explore, quest, farm, and build. Experience the enchantment of Kinlings.

name: Killer
summary: KILLER: The game is a linear classic action TPS game and you need to find what will you do to finish the game. Sometimes it can be tough.

name: Kings of Wings
summary: A fast, fun and dangerous adventure...

name: King Machine
summary:
King Machine is a game about building machines.

Explore an abandoned factory, finding useful machinery and gradually building the tools and structures you need to restore the factory to operation. What was the original purpose of the factory and why was it shut down? To achieve complete control you will eventually need to confront and overcome the powerful machines protecting the factory's most critical resources.

name: King of Math Junior
summary: Maths educational game for mobiles.

name: King of Booze: Drinking Game
summary:
King of Booze is a party game involving a wide variety of challenges, drinking, and choosing between the two. 
Whether you drink or dare, or hug, or kiss, or dance, or get naked, or slap your friend, or call your ex.. or your mom. You will have a fantastic "did that just happen" time.

name: Kingdoms of Age
summary: Kingdoms of Age is an online trading card game, which pits you against other players online to battle in the arena.

name: Kiloblocks
summary:
Build your own base, mine, castle or whatever you imagine!

Kiloblocks is a game - editor which allows you moving, building and transforming the terrain in the 3D environment.

name: King of the Couch: Zoovival
summary:
Real-time natural selection! Who will survive, a bear with a cheese or a fish with a shotgun? 
 
King of the Couch: Zoovival is the latest evolution of the platform battle arena game genre! Fight as an animal, with a wide assortment of weapons, on multiple unique battle arenas in King of the Couch: Zoovival.

name: Kibbi Keeper
summary: Forage, explore, tame, and wrangle your adorable companions in this beautiful first-person, virtual-pet, adventure game!

name: Kick Them Out!!!
summary:
Kick Them Out!!! will test your dexterity.
Control a customizable cumbrous ball through 40 challenging levels that requires skill, patience and self-control to cope with failure.

name: Kid-Venture 2: Twas the Night Before Christmas
summary: The second installment in the Kid Venture series written by James Talley and published by Adventure International.

name: King of the Eggs
summary:
The best couch party game to sit down with your friends, to whisper slowly to their ears: "Hey bro, how do you like your eggs?" to then smash their eggs into oblivion! 
Welcome to Eggorias the land where you and your friends will compete to become the King of the Eggs!

name: Kim and Prostitute
summary: Kim and Prostitute - in this game you will have to play for one of the last dictators of our time, but you will not fight against the whole world and not against individual countries, but only against the army of prostitutes. Game has 5000 achievements and comes with minimum allowable price.

name: Kingmaker
summary: Kingmaker is a chess-like game with a few twists. With all new pieces and an expanded board to play on it will give you a unique experience and many challenges on your way to becoming the kingmaker!

name: King War
summary: Who can be the last king in the dogfight between the countries of the earth and aliens? A pixel-style real-time strategy game, a simple and easy experience for placing units

name: Killing Floor 2: Ultimate Edition
summary:
For new players looking for the most comprehensive Killing Floor 2 experience in existence.
Featuring a a lot of content, including:
- Killing Floor 2 Base Game
- Armory Season Pass 1
- Armory Season Pass 2 plus many additional cosmetic items.

name: Killstreak
summary: Show your skills to the full on the battlefield

name: Kingdom's Item Shop
summary: Kingdom's Item Shop is a game that simulates running an item shop in a Fantasy Role-Playing Game Universe.

name: Kirchhoff's Revenge
summary: Kirchhoff is annoyed because nobody appreciates his circuit laws! You get transported to his secret lair and won't be able to get out until you show mastery!

name: Kitty Cat Resort
summary:
Idle Cat-Raising Game

Just the sight of these cats will make you smile!

Hey there, future cat sitters! Do you want to build a resort for cats?

name: Kitty Catsanova
summary: Kitty Catsanova is the premier Idle Cat Dating Sim! Collect adorable kitties and win their hearts by taking them out on lavish dates, crafting exquisite gifts, and buying them wondrous presents. Manage your time carefully, since you don't want any kitties to get lonely!

name: King's Son
summary: The King's son, whose kingdom has been taken from him, wants his kingdom back

name: Kiki's Vacation
summary: Kiki's Vacation sets you off to the breezy paradise of Kokoloko Island in a relaxing idle adventure! Join Kiki as she befriends the locals, explores the islands' secrets, finds romance and discovers herself in the process!

name: Kill Your Darlings
summary: A Horror Dating Sim

name: KindergarTen 3: The Basement
summary:
The third part of the game is a little different to the other two. This part can be described as the mixture of the first two games. KindergarTen 1 was a little bit hard, full with jump scares and fast dolls/ plushies. KindergarTen 2 was much easier than the first game, but there were a few more horror elements and ambiance added; the second game gave a big focus at the backstory of the game/ of the murder.
So the third game actually contains both elements. It gives very big attention to the story, but it has even more chases and jump scares as the first one has. Now the player has to pay attention to one more thing: the oxygen pump. In every 2 minutes the player has to restart it to survive.

name: Kishin Houkou Demonbane
summary: Kishin Houkou Demonbane is a remake of Deus Machina Demonbane that makes numerous improvements to the original visual novel, such as full voice acting, lip flaps and blinking for sprites, more animated cutscenes, and a revised script, among other improvements. Unlike the original, this version does not contain any erotic content.

name: King's Bounty: Legions - Lord of Chaos Pack
summary: A balanced starter pack for King's Bounty players. Take command of a squad of powerful creatures from the Chaos faction with a nice discount! Primordial chaos retreated under the pressure of the Creator. Forced beyond the borders of corporeality, unbeaten and primal, it now bides its time for a decisive attack.

name: Killing Floor: Steampunk Character Pack 2
summary: The Victorian era was never so fun and deadly. The Steampunk Character Pack 2 adds 4 more new and unique playable characters for Killing Floor as Downloadable Content. Once you have bought the pack, they will become selectable in the character selection screen in-game.

name: Kitty Cat's Drag Race
summary: Kitty Cat Drag Race is a visual novel about the first day of a reality show in which a person is found dead. What would you if you were the greatest drag queen cat on the planet?

name: Kirakira Monstars
summary: It's sure to bring a smile to everyone's face! In the big city of the human world, a group of monstrous girls go about their daily lives in a serious, anything-goes, slapstick frenzy!

name: Kill the Superweapon
summary: Samantha Kill is on a mission to take down Abaddon Inc. and their Bio-Mechanical Supersoldiers. 3D Twin-Sick Action game where bosses can roam from room to room.

name: Kilemol
summary: Kilemol is a top-down shooter where you'll have to destroy all spawn capsules and enemies using different weapons in a dynamic gameplay.

name: KINDa
summary: It has been designed for old-school, single player and cooperative play. There are 32 maps and the themes really vary.

name: Kill/Cure: Beautiful Vice
summary: Kill/Cure: Beautiful Vice is a murder mystery visual novel with death game elements. Explore colorful seasonal environments, interact with a cast of fun and flawed characters, and “No, that’s wrong!” your way through thrilling Class Trial sequences.

name: KittenMouse: Summer of Love
summary: First Person Shooter, with a full single player campaign and story. Fight through 5 fiery and action packed levels, and enjoy the inspiring story of one man determined to defend his town! Multiple weapon and enemy types.

name: Kings Age
summary: Browser game.

name: Killerwatt
summary: Horizontal Shoot em Up by Alligata Software released in 1984.

name: Killfest
summary: Killfest is a fast-paced arcade FPS that fuels your adrenaline rush! Shoot and slice your way through the pit by yourself or with friends! Think fast and coordinate your assault as you progress though waves of unique and challenging foes.

name: Kingdoms: Merge & Build
summary: Match things to rebuild your kingdom in this puzzle game exclusive to Apple Arcade.

name: Kill X
summary: Kill X is a first person shooter horor game for PS VR platform made by chinese developer VIVAGAMES.

name: King of the Times
summary: This is a casual and fun game with a cute cartoon style.

name: Kickster Online Street Soccer
summary: new free2play Online Street Soccer Game and is in beta right now

name: Kingdom Two Crowns: Essentials Pack
summary: Get the full Kingdom Two Crowns experience with this bundle, which includes all additional campaign expansions for the game.

name: Kingdom Two Crowns: Shogun
summary: The next iteration in the successful microstrategy franchise, Kingdom Two Crowns will allow players to venture to exotic biomes across the world through expandable content. On day 1 of release, players can journey to lands inspired by the landscape, architecture, and culture of feudal Japan. Play as the mighty Shogun or Onna-bugeisha, enlist the support of the ninja, lead your soldiers to battle atop the mythological Kirin, and form new strategies as you brave the Greed hiding in the thick bamboo forests.

name: Kitty Nigiri
summary: The cat in space, sushi catching, laser puzzle solving, fireball dodging, kitten saving, chopstick wielding, flying VR game your cat's been dreaming about. Use your wits and dexterity, and prove yourself a potential champion.....

name: King of Fighters: Survival City
summary:
Gather Fighters and defeat the Afflicted and the Nests organization!
A world conquered by the Nests.
In many places around the city, Cyborgs and the Afflicted are ruining the world with violence.
We’re running short of resources and people to confront them.
Join together with the Fighters and free as many cities as possible!
In the world full of chaos and disorder,
your fists and companions are the only things you can trust...

name: KingMania
summary:
Kingmania is a quick action strategy game that will test players ability to make quick tactical decisions. 
 
Players can control different buildings, using their power and the power of troops the buildings produce to defeat their opponents. 
 
Each of the buildings in the game has another purpose and can be improved upon - castles produce strong knights and allow players to cast magical spells at enemy buildings or to summon dragons. Villages provide food as well as villagers, who are weak warriors, but attack in hordes and when they turn to berserkers, they can gain a destructible force. Gold can be gathered at mines, mage towers can shoot fireballs and destroy garrisons in enemy houses, etc.

name: King Arthur & the Knights of Justice
summary:
Based on the cartoon series of the same name, King Arthur and the knights of Camelot have been encased inside glass by Morgana Le Faye. Only the Spell of Spells would be able to free them. Merlin, knowing that the world would come to ruin without King Arthur uses his magic to search all of space and time for replacements. Finding the New York Knights football team and their quarterback, Arthur King, Merlin transports them back to Camelot and gives them magical armor. Transformed into; Sir Arthur, Sir Breeze, Sir Brick, Sir Darren, Sir Gallop, Sir Lancelot, Sir Lug, Sir Phil, Sir Tone, Sir Trunk, Sir Wally and Sir Zeke, they must rescue the real Knights of the Round Table. In order to do so, the Arthur must recover the 12 keys of truth from Morgana's lieutenants each of which can only by touched by a specific knight. However in order to be able to defeat them, Arthur must first recover Excalibur and overcome other tasks.

King Arthur & the Knights of Justice is a top-down action game. It might be mistaken for an RPG, however the abilities of characters do not change over the course of the game. Players control Arthur King and can recruit two additional party members from the knights. Each knight has his own statistics in various areas including: Life Force, Defense, Strength and Speed. These party members are computer controlled with their own energy bars. Arthur can move up, down, left and right, block with his shield and parry with his shield. Arthur can swing his sword at any time but the damage inflicted depends on how much strength bar he has. The strength bar replenishes itself naturally over time, but is depleted every time Arthur swings his sword. Each knight including Arthur has a health bar, when this bar runs out, the knight is defeated. It can be restored by returning to Camelot or using items such as healing herbs. Arthur can carry a variety of different items accessible from the menu. Other menu functions include looking at the map, changing preferences and reviewing the statistics of the knights.

name: King Arthur: Knight's Tale - Brigands Skirmish Pack
summary: Defeat a rebellious band of Brigands in ten uniquely designed skirmish maps, including five difficulty settings. This content requires the base game King Arthur: Knight's Tale in order to run.

name: Kikansha Thomas: DS de Hajimeru Kokugo Sansuu Eigo
summary: Kikansha Thomas: DS de Hajimeru Kokugo Sansuu Eigo is an edutainment game where the player can learn Japanese, arithmetic and English.

name: Kittens in Space
summary: Create your space colony for kittens and conquer the galaxy in this hand drawn card-battler inspired by Stacklands and Card Hog. Manage resources, explore alien worlds, conquer other civilizations or make new allies.

name: King's Throne: Royal Delights
summary: Empire management game, with a focus on courting beautiful maidens to expand your dynasty.

name: Kiwi's Quest
summary: Against deadly pirates!

name: Kill the Old Gods
summary: An indie color-matching bullet-hell inspired by ikaruga and old-school boss fights

name: Kill Your Shapes
summary: Kill Your Shapes is a third-person shooter roguelike set in a world where reality and creation has been simplified down to shapes. Kill the enemy shapes and get new items and abilities. There are several levels and bosses to beat.

name: Kingdom Rush HD
summary:
Get ready for an epic journey to defend your kingdom against hordes of orcs, trolls, evil wizards and other nasty fiends using a vast arsenal of towers and spells at your command! 
 
Fight on forests, mountains and wastelands, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower upgrades and specializations! Rain fire upon your enemies, summon reinforcements, command your troops, recruit elven warriors and face legendary monsters on a quest to save the Kingdom from the forces of darkness!

name: Kingdom Majestic: Limited Edition
summary:
Kingdom games are 2D sidescrolling strategy/resource management hybrid people have come to love. With a minimalist feel wrapped in a beautiful, modern pixel art aesthetic, you play the role of a king or queen atop their horse and enter a procedurally generated realm primed to sustain a kingdom, then toss gold to peasants and turn them into your loyal subjects in order to make your kingdom flourish. Protect your domain at night from the greedy creatures looking to steal your coins and crown, and explore the nearby, mysterious forests to discover curious and cryptic artifacts to aid your kingdom.

The limited edition bundle comes with a reversible inlay, a 3D lenticular image, 4 artworks representing an island from Kingdom and the original digital soundtracks.

name: Kill the Censored 2
summary: "Kill the Censored 2" is a revolution clicker with naked girls.

name: Kindergarten Secret
summary: Kindergarten Secret - detective, horror and puzzle in one game. You will be able to play as several characters in the frame of one game, complete twenty unique quests and uncover the main secret of the story.

name: Kiki Kaikai: The Bizarre World
summary: The mobile phone version of KiKi KaiKai.

name: King Kong
summary: An LCD game inspired by Donkey Kong. It is part of the Large Screen line by Tiger Electronics.

name: Kindred
summary: In this eerie, horror visual novel, you are confined in a room with a monster. How will you fare against petrifying odds? Will you be able to work your way into the mind of an indecipherable beast, or will you be added to the casualty count? A word of advice: Choose a side; don't look back.

name: Kindergarten: Buddy Edition
summary: Uncover a grand conspiracy by living the same day over and over again. With the power of friendship, excessive violence, and nuggets, you will discover the truth.

name: King and Kingdoms
summary: Factions, countries and empires that have truly existed in the real history await you. The only difference is that it is in your hand to rewrite their history. Become the ruler of any country you want and lead your nation from small village to the way to be the magnificent empire!

name: Kiddie Coaster
summary: An arcade game/motion simulator often found in children's arcade such as Chuckie Cheese. Somewhat revolutionized the children's arcade.

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam F91: Formula Senki 0122
summary: A sci-fi strategy game based in the Gundam universe that was published by Bandai in 1991 for the Super Famicom.

name: King Arthur's World
summary:
This is a 2D side scrolling strategy game. You take the role of King Arthur and lead your army into battle against evil. You'll travel to many worlds including fighting dark knights, underworld orcs, and cloud giants. One of the few games that is Super NES Mouse capable.

You are given a certain amount of troops each level. Passwords are used to save your progress between levels. The levels have enemies you must thwart, traps you should avoid, and gold to be won.

name: Kirby: Revenge of Dream Land
summary: Tougher levels, tougher enemies, tougher everything! This mod of Kirby's Return to Dreamland increases the difficulty tenfold in order to create an experience for Kirby veterans looking for a challenge.

name: Kingdom Chess
summary: The world's most popular board game enhanced with unique pieces, various maps and new game modes. Experience gorgeous graphics, engaging campaign, challenging puzzles and diverse battles.

name: Kim Kardashian: Hollywood
summary: Join KIM KARDASHIAN on a red carpet adventure! Create your own aspiring celebrity and rise to fame and fortune!

name: Kidz Sports: Ice Hockey
summary:
LACE UP YOUR SKATES!

Get your skates on and take control of your favorite Kidz Sports characters in some of the wackiest games of ice hockey ever!

• Pick Up and Play: Use the Wii Remote and Nunchuk to skate rings around the competition and slap shot your way to victory!
• Hours of Fun: Defeat all challengers in the single-player Knockout Cup tournament, or take on a friend in two-player head-to-head action!
• Wild Zany Action: This isn't your parents' ice hockey game! Unleash dominating Super Moves with Wii Remote gestures, like chip shots, power shots, and more!

name: Kill the Dictator
summary: This is a casual strategy simulation game. The game's goal is to overthrow the dictator as the rebel force, or to suppress the rebels as the the government army.

name: Kingdom Clicker
summary: Click for glory and honour!

name: Kitty Krawler
summary:
Puzzle, action, friendship! Jazz the Cat is up to visiting Jeenxie the Kitty. Climb the vine and crawl your way to the window where your friend lives. Wait, but Jazz is afraid of heights!
And of spiders, and of many other hazards...
Could Jeenxie help maybe? Would you help them both?!

name: Kiki's Adventure
summary: On a day out fishing,Alan and his father accidentally found a red-haired woman unconscious on the beach,Save her home after the discovery of the woman in addition to his name (qiqi), lost all memory. A few days later, while kiki was resting at home, Alan's father came to her house and asked for her help.

name: King Flames
summary: Aaaaah! King Flames just switched teams and everyone’s out to burn his jersey! Help save him by moving his jersey away from the dangerous flames. It’s no easy task when the heat gets turned up. Beat your high score and unlock LeBrawn’s friends who also need your help. Save your favorite characters and reach the top of the leaderboards!

name: KickOff
summary: KickOff was an online soccer game.

name: Kite Fight
summary: Kite Fight simulates kite flying using simple gestures and movements aided by the Move controller. Fly kites around the world and partake in the championships for the ultimate title of Kite Maestro!

name: Killer Watt
summary: You have to fight your way out of a cavern.

name: Killer Dolls Battle Arena
summary: Killer Dolls Battle Arena is a frenetic and challenging game that combines hack 'n' slash bullet-hell mechanics. Choose between various heroines and fight your way through different locations, facing hordes of monsters to survive.

name: Kings of Soccer - Multiplayer Football Game
summary: Lead Borussia Dortmund, FC Barcelona, Arsenal & other football giants to glory

name: Kindred
summary: Kindred is the first and only book of the Kindred series.

name: Kiss of Death
summary: Kiss of Death is the first and only book of the Kiss of Death series.

name: Kingdom Hearts Integrum Masterpiece
summary: Experience the full story of KINGDOM HEARTS! The journey begins in KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX- as Sora, Donald, and Goofy battle the Heartless, making friends and having spectacular adventures along the way. The story culminates in KINGDOM HEARTS III + Re Mind, where our heroes take on tremendous challenges and persevere against the darkness threatening iconic Disney and Pixar worlds.

name: Kinaman vs Gray Elephant
summary: Hardcore platformer Kinaman vs Gray Elephant. Inspired by the stories of one blogger about childhood.

name: Kick of Dungeon
summary: Collect and combine different cards, challenge all kinds of monsters, encounter different random events!

name: Kivi's Underworld
summary: Kivi's Underworld is a casual, hack and slash game.

name: Kings Odyssey: Dwarves Tale
summary: Unearth the secrets of the deep and forge your legacy in 'King's Odyssey: Dwarves' Tale,' where every hammer strike tells a story of bravery and brotherhood.

name: Kitty Curling
summary: Deliver your chonky cats to the food bowl!

name: King Erik
summary: In this Medieval 2D platformer game, you play as King Erik, a young man who has acquired the Scepter of Might and must fight his way through tricky passages and deadly contraptions to regain his kingdom from the clutches of his Uncle's Saxon armies!

name: Kikak
summary: A new casual word game puzzle

name: Kikuni Masahiko: Jirushi Warau Fukei-san Pachi-Slot Hunter
summary: Released in 1994 for the PlayStation.

name: Kingdom of the Untitled Magic
summary: Get on a magical adventure full of mysteries and dangers! Become a glorified hero and free the kingdom from the awakened ancient evil while forging your unique path through the open world, using magic, diplomacy, or brute force.

name: Kingdom Hearts Magical Puzzle Clash
summary: Kingdom Hearts Magical Puzzle Clash, stylized as Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days Magical Puzzle Clash, was an online flash game released to the Disney website by Square Enix and Disney. It has since been discontinued and is no longer officially accessible. The game was made to promote Kingdom Hearts 358/2 Days and is not canon to the series in any way.

name: KickHim
summary: Tired of neighbors or anyone around? Kick him - this is a very fun game for haters furious neighbors. You can choose different items that will be hitting it.

name: Killing a Superstar
summary: Killing a Superstar brings a new VR interactive experience with immersive sense of drama. The story will start in different spaces at the same time. Viewers can use the map function in the film to freely switch among different scenes. The viewers need to answer the key questions to solve crimes.

name: King's Field II
summary:
King's Field II -- the hour of destiny is at hand... Your kingdom is once again under attack by the ruthless minions of evil. This time they have possessed King Alfred himself! As the King's son, Prince Lyle, you must bring forth the tide of change that will effect the universe from now until the end of time. The fate of the world is in your hands!

Re-enter the realm of King's Field for the most explosive debut on the PlayStation yet... ASCII Entertainment went all out to provide a fully non-linear three dimensional world that even blows away the original! The intense action and powerful storytelling will keep you riveted for months!

name: Kids: Zoo Puzzle
summary: Kids: Zoo Puzzle offers unique fun and relaxing jigsaw puzzles! The game shows you cute pictures of exotic animals, which can be divided into different numbers of pieces to make your challenge easier or harder.

name: Killer Klowns From Outer Space: Infernal Ranger - Fluxo
summary: From the far reaches of space come the incredible Fluxo! Many humans will flee from this magician of death, only to find he always has tricks up his sleeve. Fluxo is a special character skin for the Ranger Klown Type and is only cosmetic.

name: Killer Instinct
summary: Shooter game for Colecovision in which you eliminate enemies. When you run out of bullets whoever has got the highest score wins.

name: King's Blade
summary: Take on the role of a warrior of an elite royal squad and defeat the bloodthirsty Barganian Empire in King's Blade - classic beat 'em up game set in a heroic fantasy setting.

name: Kings Town
summary: Build up your own civilization in the time of kings and kingdoms. Become the manager of a little town and make it to a great city. Defend it from other kingdoms and destroy them.

name: Kirby and the Forgotten Land
summary: The first level of the Switch game, now available on your Gameboy Color! Features most mechanics from the original game.

name: King of Nothing
summary: a chess-based rhythm game: Reconquer your army one beat at a time

name: Kingdoms at War
summary: Create a kingdom, defeat enemies in wars and slay treacherous enemies in epic battles in an attempt to lead a clan to victory.

name: Kids Station: Bokura to Asobou! Ultraman TV
Kishi Densetsu
summary: Kishi Densetsu is a 1993 war simulation game for the Sega Mega Drive by Kodansha Research Institute released exclusively in Japan.

name: Killing Zone
summary:
In a mythical realm, in some unheard of dimension, all of the world's greatest monsters and mythological creatures have gathered to battle it out through this one-on-one 3D fighting game. Frankenstein, Medusa, Wolfman, the Minotaur, and a half-dozen others join this cast of classic monsters.

Fighting mechanics mix elements from both Street Fighter II and Virtua Fighter, with directional combinations and button-tap sequences used for all of the special moves.

name: Kingdom Coins: Dozer of Coins Arcade Game - Pirate Booty Edition
Kingsburg Serving the Crown
summary: With the help of the King’s trusted advisors, you will obtain the resources to construct buildings, strengthen your defences and train your army. Challenge the artificial intelligence or compete with your friends to prove yourself the most skilled governor!

name: Kiss: Psycho Circus - The Nightmare Child
Kirby Star Ride
summary: Kirby Star Ride is a Flash game made by 4Kids as a promotion for Kirby: Right Back at Ya!. The game was only up for 1 year before being delisted from the website. The game is currently lost, with 0 information about the game surviving online apart from it's existence.

name: Killer Elite: Time to Die
summary: Shoot or die. New shooter in two view modes. Post-apo maps, enjoy with your friends !

name: Kieta Princess
summary: Kieta Princess is an adventure game for the Family Computer Disk System, developed by Imagineer and published at the end of 1986. It is part of the Wave Jack series of games produced by Imagineer that come with more accessories than the average video game, including a story book and audio cassette tape.

name: Kingdoms of Marazia: Classic
summary: Conquer lands and build your kingdom in this multiplayer, real-time strategy game. Defend your castle and expand your army or be wiped off the map. Forging alliances may help you survive, but ultimately, it’s every man for himself in the ruthless world of Marazia.

name: Kids Jigsaw Puzzles: Fun Games for Girls & Boys
summary: Jigsaw puzzle is a simple exciting game which millions of kids and grown-ups all round the world enjoy.

name: Kira-kira Star Night DX
summary: Kira Kira Star Night DX follows Fami-chan. She’s a young woman jumping around environments, attempting to catch stars while chiptunes play in the background. The goal is to get a certain number of stars before time runs out. There are nine stages total, and the game features music from Takeaki Kunimoto, Yuriko Keino, Yuzo Koshiro, Nobuyuki Koshiro, Tappy, Manami Matsumae, Hally, Bun, Robokabuto, Yasuhisa Watanabe, and Takeshi Yokemura.

name: King of the Castle
summary:
You are the king of the castle! 
 
In this epic adventure, you must conquer two unique castles in order to become the ultimate victor! The two levels are "Stars of Death" and "Pillars of Gloom". 
 
You begin the game as an icon, of a crown, inside a single layer of the castle. You must navigate throughout the layer to the next portal which will take you to the next layer above or below your current layer. Watch out though there are hordes of enemies throughout each layer all looking to destroy the king. 
 
Who knew it was so hard to be King!

name: King of Pyramid Thieves
summary: In the riveting adventure game, King of Pyramid Thieves, you step into the shoes of a skillful thief seeking fortune.

name: King's Hand
summary: Classic 1v1 Chess, but you also have unique cards that will help you with dethroning your opponent's King. There is no checkmate nor stalemate, just a brawl between two royal families.

name: Kingdoms
summary: KINGDOMS is a procedural medieval RPG in a randomly generated open world. The main feature of KINGDOMS is a smart AI system that completely controls NPC behavior. As the player, you can fully interact with this massive world and become any person you want to be.

name: Killer Backflip 999
summary: Test yourself for dexterity: dodge strikes, overcome many obstacles! Lasers, blasters, grenades, flamethrowers and much more - everything will go to play.

name: Kings of Streets
summary: Starting from a homeless person who wakes up at a bus station. All you have is a penny in your pocket and some cash in your bank account. Go out into the city and work hard to earn your first money. The streets will be your home.

name: Killer Auto
summary: A futuristic racing game being developed by Ethan Redd, featuring new music from 2 Mello, Christa Lee, SKYBRIDGE, and Skylar Spence.

name: Kingdom Wars 2: Battles
summary: Kingdom Wars II: Battles brings a fresh perspective on the fantasy real-time Strategy genre, combining the best of Zombie survival and long term crafting with complex fast-paced city-building and skirmish siege combat. All in a beautifully, yet gory game world where players fight across the epic battlefields in multiplayer skirmish and coop with thousands of other players. And with an episodic singleplayer campaign bringing epic storytelling, with countless battles and adventures.

name: Kingdom Hearts Tamagotchi
summary: Kingdom Hearts Tamagotchi is a handheld LCD game, released by Bandai Namco Entertainment in 2022 for Kingdom Hearts’s 20th anniversary. The user begins with Sora who can evolve to different forms and characters based on the type of care received and games played. There are three minigames to play (Gummi Ship, Pink Agaricus, and Coliseum) and throughout the day scenes from the Kingdom Hearts series will play out on screen. Enemy monsters will also attack on occasion and it's up to the user to fight them off before they injure their character.

name: Kinda Knirpsi
summary: Take on the role of Knirpsi the turtle and face a variety of enemies. Experience retro cartoon-style shooter action and hand-drawn boss battles. You will die. Many Times.

name: Kids ABC Order
summary: 10 random words are displayed from one of the lists that need to be placed in alphabetic order. Just move the row where it needs to go. When you think it is alphabetical order then check your answer.

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Gihren no Yabou
summary: Turn-based strategy game set in the Mobile Suit Gundam franchise, in Universal Century 0079. It adds political and military management to the One Year War, letting the player choose which side to play as The Earth Federation, The Principality of Zeon or any other splinter faction.

name: Kinfire Chronicles
summary: Kinfire Chronicles is a cooperative, quest-based RPG board game set in a brand-new fantasy universe.

name: Kisou Ryouhei Gunhound EX
summary:
In the future, everyone is scrambling for a new energy source called the Neutronpolymer. Beltonia, a tiny country that is moving toward democracy is discovered to hold large amounts of Neutronpolymer in their lands.

To prevent the wars from getting out of hand, the authorities send the 9th Kisou Ryouhei regiment, called the Gunhound to the fray. This is a very small team, but their participation in the war efforts will change the path of the whole country.

name: Killer at the Shop
summary: Take your groceries and leave the shop without dying.

name: Kittens in Post-Apocalyptic Fantasy San Francisco: Battle School for Only the Most Awesome Monsters
summary: Save a fallen land from despair and doom via recruiting and training adorable but deadly (and awesome) monsters!

name: Kitchen Trials: Rush
summary: Return to the kitchen as fast as possible using your chef's knife on a chain to whip through living vegetables to pass your first trial in this kitchen-themed 2D platformer. Obtain all the stars with the fastest times to surpass the other competitors! How fast will you rush back to the kitchen?

name: Killer Ricky
summary: Play as Killer Ricky and avenge his family by killing all members of a bloodthirsty Mafia organization.

name: Kittypocalypse
summary: Kittypocalypse is an in-depth, strategic tower defense game built exclusively for VR. Across a diverse range of environments, defeat the hordes of evil alien kitties and salvage what's left of your home planet.

name: King of Colosseum II
summary: Dedicated to all of the professional wrestling fans around the world, the birth of the strongest in professional wrestling games is finally here. Over 150 real to life licensed wrestlers, over 2800 motion capped moves! This is wrestling at maximum volume, the strongest work. This is the "King of Colosseum II!

name: Kill The Emoji: The Remake
summary: They have gone too far with the emojis, now its time to kill them all (Once again and with new funky colors and emojis)!

name: Kindness
summary: A narrative text game exploring a long dead civilisation.

name: Kitty Death Room
summary: Journey through death and puzzles to uncover the secrets of the tower.

name: Kingdom Under Fire: Gold
summary:
This Gold Edition includes:

- Kingdom Under Fire
- Gold Patch

name: Kick and Run
summary: A football game where you can either play cooperatively in cup events or head-to-head.

name: Kingdom of Wreck Business
summary: The depths of the Atlantic hide more than 12,000 sunken ships out of which at least half haven’t been located yet. As a depth explorer you will earn money from extracting valuable cargo from wrecks, grow your company, buy exploration vessels and real estate.

name: Kintsukuroi
summary: A puzzle game from Chelsea Saunders.

name: Kill the God
summary: A action filled pixel art first person hack n' slash with many bosses, items and story points. Play as the fallen god of speed to reclaim what you had wrongfully revoked.

name: Kingdom Unwritten
summary: Embark on a journey of mystery and unravel the fallen fate of the Kingdom through your choices. Will you save or destroy the kingdom? The choice is yours.

name: Kitaria Heroes: Force Bender
summary: Force Bender tells a story of the adventure of a sword magician named elena. she lost her family because of a mysterious dark magician's deeds. The dark magician also spreads chaos and nightmare to the land. Elena trained hard in order to take revenge and bring back peace to the land. Taste the full action RPG (Role Playing Game) as you wipe out monsters in your journey! Feels the unique action as you play as Elena with her variety of magics and sword techniques! Help Elena defeat the dark magician!

name: Killing Floor: Mrs. Foster Pack
summary: Mr. Foster has been a firm favorite with Killing Floor fans for years now - but he's been all on his own. So we thought it was about time we introduced you all to... Mrs. Foster! She was a scarily-successful commodities trader when she interviewed Foster for a job.

name: Kinnikuman: Dirty Challenger
summary: Kinnikuman: Dirty Challenger is a wrestling game published by Yutaka and developed by an unknown developer-for-hire. It is based on the Kinnikuman license, known in the west as Ultimate Muscle. The player can select between six wrestlers in the single player story mode with an additional two secret characters to unlock for the multiplayer versus mode.

name: Kinkey Dong
summary:
This Donkey Kong clone is published as a type-in listing in the book “Sensational Games for the Amstrad CPC 464”. The book was published by Collins and Jim Gregory wrote the game.

The game also a re-pumping published as a type-in listing in the Greek magazine Pixel n° 47 - September 1988, with Stathis SDRALIS and Petros ATHANASIOU handling the re-pumping.

In 2019, a revised and improved version was released as a homebrew release.

name: King of Mazes
summary: “King of Mazes” is an adult comedic harem RPG. Go on a quest like none other and save the kingdom of it’s unique and strange problems by thinking out of the box and using your problem-solving skills!

name: King Oddball Ends the World
summary: End the world in a unique skill based physics puzzle! King Oddball swings a boulder back and forth by its tongue.

name: King's Field: Additional I
summary: King's Field: Additional I is a RPG video game published by FromSoftware released on July 20th, 2006 for the PlayStation Portable

name: King's Field: Pilot Style
summary:
The three King's Field PS1 games form a trilogy relating the saga of a mythical country named Verdite. King's Field 1 (released only in Japan) was the first RPG for the Playstation console and King's Field 2 (released as "King's Field" in the US and EU) was the first ever Playstation RPG in the US and Europe.

King's Field: Pilot Style is a mini game whose story takes place in the period between King's Field 2 and King's Field 3. Pilot Style was given away as a promotional item at a game show in Japan and went relatively unnoticed. It only takes about an hour to complete, but it is an interesting tidbit in the King's Field world.

name: King of the World
summary: King of the World is the gameplay from RISK in a Real-time strategy setting. Fight up to 12 players against each other while scheming, backstabbing, making shallow alliances or simply conquer to become the last man standing.

name: Kilubu Magic Potions 2
summary:
Kilubu is a quiet village ...
Until a day of curious events happens: Renée can no longer sing, Tom becomes clumsy on the job, Emir is turning red ...
All the villagers are rushing to Sacha, the sorcerer! With his famous magic potions, he will stir up solutions to all of their bizarre problems!
Using the Magic Book of Spells and some clever investigating, players work with Sacha to make the right potions for people who need your help!

name: Kitty Patrol: Paw Showtime
summary: Discover the adventures of this patrol of adventurous kittens who will have to save the world together.

name: Kinky Fight Club
summary: Kinky Fight Club is a real-time 3D adult RPG about competitive sex fights. Become champion of the KYFC ring or sit back and watch the kinkiest fights! Customize every aspect of the match to create sexy experiences that match your mood and fantasies.

name: Ki(n)ds
summary:
Ki(n)ds Is an indie RPG that focuses on comedy, weird enemies, a rare set of characters, and a bunch of strangely independent frogs.

Marcus and his bookworm pseudo-friend Damon embark on an adventure to find Marcus' young brother Al, who has been kidnapped by aliens.

name: King of Fate
summary: King of Fate is based on real history, real-time strategy, real-time control, commanding famous generals to fight fiercely on the battlefield, summoning celebrities to govern the country and the people, sweeping Liuhe like the first emperor, and ruling the world, looking forward to your joining!

name: Kingdoms of Myth
summary: Turn-based strategy game depicting a high variety of historical factions including mythological elements. Start on classic antiquity and move your faction to Renaissance to defeat your enemies! Build an army with unique units all over the world lead by powerful heroes with unique skills!

name: Killer Instinct: Definitive Edition
summary:
FIGHT ON!

Discover your Killer Instinct! Play the legendary fighting game with stunning 60FPS visuals, over-the-top action, a wild cast of combatants, rocking reactive music, and C-C-C-COMBO BREAKERS!

Features:

• Includes all 26 characters from Seasons 1-3, including Shadow Jago, Rash from Battletoads, Arbiter from Halo and General RAAM from Gears of War

• 20 stages with intense stage destruction

• Killer Instinct Classic 1 & 2 for Xbox One

• Explore the lore, characters and history of Killer Instinct with all-new behind-the-scenes videos, trailers and art

• All the music of Killer Instinct, including Killer Cuts

• Competitive online multiplayer matches with state-of-the-art fighting game netcode

• Test your skill online in Monthly Ranked Leagues

• Cinematic story modes

• Extensive Dojo tutorial teaches all the core mechanics for Killer Instinct

• Train an AI combatant and challenges your friends to asynchronous matches in Shadow Lab

Xbox Live Features:

• Play Anywhere with online multiplayer Cross Play with Windows 10 and Cloud Save between Xbox One and Windows 10

• Killer Instinct includes rich Xbox Live features like Achievements, Game DVR, Leaderboards and more

name: Kingdom-Heroes
summary: Kingdom-Heroes offers real time strategy fun in 2D Pixelart optics and cool atmospheric music and sound. Build up your Colony by placing every building where you want and recruiting as many units as you want! Build outposts, Farming stations or strengthen your defenses!

name: Kick Ball
summary: Kick Ball is a puzzle-style game, in which the player will have to go through challenges such as saws, thorns, bombs in order to reach the goal.

name: Kisekimura: ZumiIwa
summary: This DLC adds Skjema, new missions and gems to the world of Kisekimura.

name: Kitty & Friends: Blast of Fun
summary: Dive into the world with our characters Kitty the Leader, Panda the Chef and Doggy the Athlete and many more! Help our characters in learning and discovering new things, by completing different addictive levels in each story! Blast toy cubes and create bonuses, blast the whole place!

name: Kick-Flight
summary: Kick-Flight” brings you a new mobile experience of free-flying and midair battles.

name: Kill the Ragdoll Stickman 2
summary: Give him pain!!! Boss the ragdoll man around and give him as much pain as you can. Push him off mountains, off skyscrapers, backflip him in to turbo cars, and even throw him in to an asteroid. This is bone breaking, dummy snapping physics fun at its best. Lots of levels to make the fun last, hilarious situations, and bags of re-play value. Just tap the ok buttons when he's standing to dismount him.

name: King of the Mountain: Premium
summary: Start your mountain journey with 100 crowns and an extra 10 cars unlocked from the start. Stay on the track, complete clean laps, earn crowns and unlock cars. Work your way up the mountain to drive a v8 supercar. Lower graphical settings for better frame rates and physics stability.

name: King of Hell
summary: King of Hell is a 6-player, online, Arcade Party Game. You play against your friends in a arena filled with random Items and Jump'n Run obstacles. Try to knock your opponents into the lava to stash points and then climb up to the top platform, to score your points and become King of Hell!

name: King Fishing
summary: King Fishing classic fish species and cool special effects, all kinds of goldfish, featured fish, let you love, bring super experience, retain childhood fishing memories, innovation to join the room theme gameplay, release skills sprint list!

name: King War
summary: Who can be the last king in the dogfight between the countries of the earth and aliens? A pixel-style real-time strategy game, a simple and easy experience for placing units

name: Kind Donations
summary:
It's a late night at the _____ Museum. The island representative has come in to donate today's haul of insects.

Explore a museum warped by the perspective of its humble curator, burdened with the task of homing his worst nightmare.

A short Animal Crossing horror game about insect donations.

name: King's Bounty: Platinum Edition
summary: Includes King's Bounty: The Legend, King's Bounty: Armored Princess and its expansion King's Bounty: Crossworlds.

name: Kingdom Grand Prix
summary: Kingdom Grand Prix is a vertically scrolling shooter/racing hybrid arcade game created by Eighting/Raizing, it was later ported to the Sega Saturn. It is the second in the Mahou Daisakusen series, but the first to include the bizarre but original feature of being a shooter/racing hybrid.

name: Kittens with Cannons: Prelude
summary: An action-RPG where you control a squad of gun-wielding cats! Complete quests, aid kitizens, and blast your way through the robot army!

name: Kingless Pawns
summary: Kingless Pawns is a turn-based strategy Game with rogue-like elements. Personalize, Equip and Upgrade your Pawn in order to Defeat the Evil King.

name: Kid Bludd's Treacherous Tower
summary: Bubble Bobble Inspired Platformer

name: Kick Club
summary:
Sports are fighting over over who is best! Let's all play together!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Kinetic Connection
summary:
Kinetic Connection is a Sega Game Gear puzzle game released only in Japan. It appears to be part of a series of games by Sadato Taneda but the relationship is unknown. In the game, you must reconstruct a scrambled video loop by swapping and rotating tiles.

The game has numerous cameos from Opa-Opa of Fantasy Zone fame.

name: King Arthur's Heir
summary: Being King Arthur's favorite in succeeding him on the throne of Camelot, your king sends you on a quest to retrieve the Scroll of Truth in order to prove yourself worthy.

name: Kick Start
summary: A motorcycle racing game from Taito.

name: Kings and Heroes
summary: There’s a new world to explore! Customize a character from one of six races to begin as an adventurer in the town of Everdale. Assemble a party and gear up in your epic quest to become a powerful and renowned hero.

name: Kingdom of the Winds: Yeon
summary: Mobile version of Nexon Co.’s Kingdom of the Winds

name: Kith - Tales from the Fractured Plateaus
summary: Kith is free regular mini-adventure series, set on a planet covered in fractured plateaus above a dark and ominous mist.

name: Kids Cars and Trucks Logic Memory Puzzles
summary: A collection of educational and fun logic puzzles and memory training games for young lovers of cars, trucks and engines. The app teaches young children the alphabet, counting, memory and logic skills within the theme of vehicles and transportation in a fun and intuitive way. The games vary in difficulty and include five distint game challenges.

name: Kitty Adventure
summary: Kitty Adventure is a classic platformer overlooking the side. The kitten lost his family, help him find her.

name: Kingdom Under Fire: Avalanche
summary:
Kingdom Under Fire Avalanche was a online game that will allow players to battle each other as 2 heroes from the other Kingdom Under Fire Series. It will also have a PvE mode where players have a AI army and they must defeat the other AI army.

It was supposed to be realesed in 2017. The game was shown in beta in 2011 in Korea but due to poor reviews it ended up being cancelled.

name: Kitten Kingdom
summary: Join adorable kittens in Kitten Kingdom, a 2D platformer game with engaging gameplay, cute graphics, and an amazing soundtrack. Explore a vast and colorful world, collect money, and navigate challenging obstacles. Escape the monotony of everyday life with this charming game for all ages.

name: Kimi ni Steady
summary: A dating sim for PC.

name: Kidnappers
summary: Kidnappers is a horror game where you aim to escape without being caught by mysterious visitors while retrieving the game you lent to your friend.

name: Kids Mosaic Art Shape and Color Picture Puzzles
King of The Hill
summary: "King Of The Hill" is a top-down survival game where you have to defend your castle from enemies. Hire knights and heroes, improve them and your economy, fight different enemies and set records for time.

name: King Arthur
summary: A rare game made by an unknown company for the Atari 2600. It is an adventure game.

name: Kinder
summary:
In a certain town in a certain place, there lived a boy named Shunsuke Takano. One day, Shunsuke set out alone to visit his grandparents' house, and on a Saturday morning, he promptly departed. It seems that his neighbor, Mami is coming along with him to the bus stop.
However, there was still some time before the bus arrived, so Shunsuke-kun decided to go to the secret meeting place where he usually gathers with his friends.
After playing there for a while, Shunsuke-kun finally boarded the bus.
The next day, when Shunsuke returned he finds not his familiar hometown, but a ruined town of death...

Players control the elementary school protagonist, Shunsuke Takano, navigating the transformed 'town' where they live. The game involves defeating three monsters and uncovering hidden mysteries. Aside from the three monsters, be aware of various traps and puzzles. Additionally, choices and actions in the game may lead to the death of other companions. Be cautious and think carefully about your actions to understand the consequences. Even if companions die, the story will continue, but the ending may change slightly.

While the initial goal is to defeat the three monsters, the objective may shift along the way. You'll eventually discover the truth behind the story. Admittedly, the content may be divisive, especially considering the horror genre with elementary school protagonists.

Encounters are generally non-existent (only occurring during specific events). The game primarily features event-based battles, and as such, the concept of leveling up is not present.

name: Killapede
summary: A Centipede clone published by Players Software for various 8-bit homecomputers.

name: Kick Off 3: European Challenge
summary:
Kick Off 3: European Challenge is a football game developed by Steve Screech for Anco Games as a sequel to Kick Off 2 (which made it to the Sega Mega Drive in the altered form of Super Kick Off). VIC Tokai published a version for the Mega Drive in 1994.

Unlike its predecessors, Kick Off 3 had no involvement from lead programmer Dino Dini, and thus plays very differently to other games in the series, having a "horizontal" pitch as opposed to a "vertical" one. Due to these radical changes, the game was met with controversy upon release. Dino Dini released his own football game around the same time for the Amiga titled Goal!, which made its way onto the Mega Drive as Dino Dini's Soccer.

name: Kita he: White Illumination
summary: The player, a second-year high school student (17 years old), travels from Tokyo to Sapporo in Hokkaido (hence the basic title of the game Kita E - To The North). There, he encounters eight different girls, including the lead character Kotori Haruno, whose family he stays with during his time up north. In the game, the player explores the island, plays video games, does karaoke, goes shopping -- and most of all, tries to find that special someone to share his heart with.

name: KinoCon! Defend my sweet home!
summary: A doujin game by Alice Margatroid Project based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Kill Pill
summary: All you need to do is kill the pills. Shoot your way to a new high score while collecting powerups to shake things up.

name: Kitty's Venture
summary: Join the kitty in a challenging fast-paced adventure to hunt for achievements. Kitty's Venture is a 2D side-scroller platformer game where you take control of a cute kitty. If you are a Steam achievement hunter, and love cats, then this is the game for you!

name: Kings
summary: Kings

name: Kinect Mega Bundle: 4 in 1
summary:
Get the most out of your Kinect with this sweet 4-in-1 bundle!

Become the hero in Kung-Fu for Kinect! Smash crystals in time to music in Beatsplosion! Save the world with an adorable squid in Squid Hero! Go ballistic with bouncing balls and exploding cubes in Boom Ball!

All games are lovingly crafted with Virtual Air Guitar's signature Kinect expertise.

name: Killer Pool
summary:
Accurate and easy to use controls. Shooting using finger swipe or power meter.
Authentic spin and swerve. Realistic physics, such as a cue that raises to avoid balls and rails. Rich, lifelike graphics featuring polygon smoothing - no more jagged 3D edges.

name: Kill Your Friends
summary: Kill Your Friends is a multiplayer online arena shooter for up to 6 players. Kill your friends, or strangers, or AI using a variety of guns & explosives! Collect coins to add to your stash - the player with the most coins at the end of the match wins!

name: Kingdoms Reborn
summary: Kingdom Reborn is a city-builder with multiplayer and open world. Guide your citizens. Grow from a tiny village to a prosperous city. Upgrade your houses and technology through eras. With multiplayer, you can cooperate or compete in real-time with your friends in the same open world.

name: Kidz Bop Dance Party!
summary: Introducing Kidz Bop's first game, a puzzle that plays 10 of today's biggest hits! Personalize it to get the party started: Pick your level of play, choose your game avatar, find the right party background and even play DJ!

name: Kill All Lice
summary: Play as the egocentric Captain Soepp and the sarcastic Lieutenant Xam'Pu in this wacky RFun & Gun to kill evil at its root by defeating the king of lice, Lous the First! Go solo or team up to stop the infestation spreading across Eloise's family! KILL ALL LICE is a proper soap opera adventure!

name: Kingdomonium
summary: The medieval procedurally generated side-scrolling real time strategy game. Build up and command your kingdom to explore and conquer the land. Forage, chop, dig, mine, build, fish, sail, explore and strategically battle your way to greatness!

name: Kiki the Nano Bot
summary: kiki the nano bot is a 3-D puzzle game, basically a mixture of the games Sokoban and Kula-World.

name: Kiss Rock City: Be A Rockstar
summary: Who doesn’t want to be a rock star? There’s only one problem: you don’t have enough money and you clash with your band over every decision. Just about to give up, you meet the super famous and glorious band members of KISS. What follows is a stardom adventure to form the next best rockband – and Kiss offers to help you!

name: Kirarin Revolution: Kira-kira Idol Audition
summary: Kirarin Revolution: Kira-kira Idol Audition is a game based on the anime series, Kirarin Revolution, for the Nintendo DS.

name: Killer Queen
summary: Killer Queen is the world’s only 10-player strategy arcade game. It’s easy to learn--each player has only one button and one joystick -- but the game is infinitely replayable.

name: Kilcount
summary: Galactic war has ended in the complete annihilation of both sides. Orphans, old folks and animals hitch rides on ghost ships, bound for nowhere. Last night, you and a convoy of strangers boarded a scuttled Dominion warship. Home is far away.

name: Kissed by the Baddest Bidder: Scattered Cards - Eisuke
Kill Him! Online Wars
summary: Join the battle! Battle with other players from all over the world. You get cool maps,boss levels,zombie map with single player and online modes.

name: King's Choice
summary: King's Choice is an exciting RPG game simulating life at the European medieval royal court. Become a legendary king and recruit famous generals, meet stunning beauties, raise your heirs, suppress rebellions, and expand your empire with the ultimate goal of becoming the supreme emperor!

name: Kingdom Hearts Re:coded Gummiship Studio
summary: Kingdom Hearts Re:coded Gummiship Studio is an arcade style game made for Facebook by Square Enix used as a promotion for Kingdom Hearts Re:coded.

name: King Boo
summary: Play as King Boo, who unfortunately has lost their royal adornments and must find them back before being allowed back in the castle! A simple, colorful adventure game for young players.

name: King Datchi
summary: Welcome to the world King Datchi, a 2D turn-based RPG where your actions weigh life and death as you train and battle to win the King Datchi Tournament. Solve puzzles, conquer gyms, and outsmart trainers to become King Datchi. Are you up for the challenge? The fate of your Datchi is in your hands!

name: King of Math
summary: Maths educational game for mobiles.

name: Kirby's Dream Land Advance
summary: Kirby's Dream Land Advance is a GBA-styled remake of HAL Laboratory's Kirby's Dream Land for Game Boy. Control your favorite pink puffball as you embark on a journey through 5 unique stages to defeat the mischievous King Dedede!

name: King of Kinks
summary: King of Kinks is a squad role-playing game based around auto 5v5 battles. Strategize heroes with unique fighting skills to overcome your enemies in battle. Power up your girls and build up your unbeatable squad! Investing time & resources in your squad of gorgeous women will get you kingly (and kinky) rewards!

name: Kikaiju Attack
summary:
This game is a tribute to all the fans of the great Japanese heroes of the 70´s, Mazinger Z and his big brother Great Mazinger. It is a game that combines Arcade-style, also some shooter and of course challenges by waves of enemies that are increasingly powerful.

Features

- You collect Kikaijus mines every 2000 points with which you can go to the store to buy weapons.
- 20 Levels.
- 8 Final Bosses
- 5 Assistants (Mazinger Z, Boss Borot, Afrodita A, Minerva X and Mazinkaiser)

name: King Randall's Party
summary: King Randall’s Party is a game about building castles and preventing other people from coming and knocking them down. Add in a splash of political satire and a ton of MacGuyver-esque traps and you've got a recipe for a good time.

name: Kiki Trick
summary: Kiki Trick is best described as a sound-based collection of mini-games. It has an eclectic art design fusing a blend of paper cut outs, hand drawn visuals, and digital photography and video featuring Japanese actors.

name: Kids on Site: Hard Hat Edition
summary: In Kids On Site: Hard Hat Edition, you will be able to take the controls of the excavator, bulldozer, steamroller, and the wrecking ball. Your goal is to complete all of the objectives at each construction site in order to earn your merit badge.

name: Kira and the Life Stone
summary: This the journey of Kira a lost soul in the state of limbo trying to get back to life and find out why is he dead. Follow him in his journey of getting back to life and get new powers, fight different enemies and find hidden secrets.

name: Kimulator 2: Brother of Time
summary: In this game, you will play the role of a French Canadian, in his quest to kill Adolf Hitler with the help of Jesus himself! Will he survive? Will he betray everyone he loved? Will he kill himself? All of this is up to you, in the sequel to Kimulator!

name: King Arthur's Petaldust Saga
summary: 800 years under the spiked heels of the English. WE DO NOT FORGIVE, WE DO NOT FORGET, NEVER SURRENDER! Journey with King Arthur in this unforgettable visual novel, as he engages in frivolous antics throughout England. Encounter ghastly apparitions, ragamuffins and gasp... ENGLISHMEN! ARGH ARGH ARGH!

name: Kitty Cat Squash
summary: Kitty Cat Squash is a super-casual and relaxing tile merge game! Use your paws to slide the adorable cats across the board and merge the cat tiles; when merged, a new cat appears. You will get hooked attempting to beat your highscore, and trying to discover all 16 cats!

name: Kill a Million Rats
summary: A roguelite bullet-heaven RTS, set in a forest invaded by an endless horde of Rats. As the Spirit of Vengeance, you must save the adorable, innocent animals. Explore a randomly generated world, harvest resources, rebuild the Hidden Village, recruit allies, and Kill a Million Rats!

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam Vol. 1 Side7
summary: Kidou Senshi Gundam Vol. 1 Side7 is a Strategy game, developed by iNPLAS and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam Version 2.0
summary: Kidou Senshi Gundam Version 2.0 is an Action game, developed by Bec and published by Bandai.

name: Kid Kirby
summary:
Briefly revealed in gaming publications, Kid Kirby was a prequel to the Kirby series starring Kirby as a baby. It was developed by DMA Design, who also developed Lemmings and Uniracers.

While very few details are known about the gameplay, a former DMA employee revealed official artwork and maps from the game.

The game was designed to be played with the SNES Mouse, but as sales of the mouse were declining, Nintendo wanted the game to play with a controller instead. The gameplay suffered as a result, and the game was eventually cancelled.

name: Kiss x Kiss: Seirei Gakuen
summary: Kiss x Kiss: Seirei Gakuen is a Strategy game, developed by Kamui and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2004.

name: Kingdoms Live
summary: Enter a world of castles and magic, where ruthless tyrants rule the lands with an iron fist. Build an army to fight these villains and anyone else who would bring darkness to the land. Collect powerful weapons, armor, and spells, and purchase valuable lands, and soon this kingdom may be yours to rule.

name: King of Halloween
summary: Weave your way past dastardly machinations, petty infighting and electoral madness as you play this political simulator/dating sim unlike any other visual novel you have played before.

name: King's Quest: Quest for the Crown
summary: King's Quest: Quest for the Crown is the first game in the King's Quest series. Players control Sir Graham, a knight of Daventry, who is tasked by King Edward to find three lost treasures to save the kingdom. The game takes place in a fairy tale-inspired world where Graham must explore, solve puzzles, and interact with various characters and creatures. Players navigate Graham through different locations, collecting items and using them to overcome obstacles. The game pioneered the graphic adventure genre, combining text commands with visual elements. As the inaugural title in the series, Quest for the Crown established many of the themes and gameplay elements that would become hallmarks of the King's Quest franchise, including its fantasy setting, puzzle-solving mechanics, and the character of Graham who would become a central figure in the series' lore.

name: Kidou Gekidan Haro Ichiza: Gundam Mahjong + Z: Sara ni Deki Ruyouni Nattana!
summary: A mahjong spin off to the long running Gundam series of games

name: Kinect PlayFit
summary: Kinect PlayFit is an Xbox Live app that tracks players' fitness activity across multiple Kinect titles. PlayFit also features its own separate achievements.

name: Kitty Cocktails
summary: All the cats are here and the party’s just getting started in Kitty Cocktails, a simple one-touch casual game that’s fun to play and challenging to master! As the resident milk-tender it’s up to you to pour the perfect glass of milk for your furry friends. Make sure you keep the milk flowing and your whiskery guests purring through jam after jam.

name: King of Phoenix
summary: King of Phoenix is a comedic adult harem dating sim set in sunny Phoenix, Arizona. Play as Dan Miller, a British journalist who is forced to take a layover in Phoenix and meets a couple of very lovely ladies there. What treasures lie in wait for him in this city? Money? Friendship? Passion? Waifus?

name: Kick Ball
summary:
A comedic baseball game in which players kick the incoming ball before running the bases. 
 
Kickball is a comedic sports game developed by Dual and published by Masaya exclusively for the Japanese PC Engine. It resembles baseball, complete with a diamond of bases to around, but the "batting" player is actually kicking the ball. The rest of the game plays like a normal round of baseball. 
 
It features seven characters - each of which represents a team of identical athletes - each with their own special pitch/kick move. These characters also include the two protagonists from the Kaizou Choujin Shubibinman series: Tasuke and Kyapiko (or Arnold and Sonia, as they're known in Shockman). Each team also has an assigned stadium that fits their theme: the seal team, for instance, have a stadium with an ice-like floor.

name: Kitt.Io
summary: Can you gain the biggest kitten following?

name: Kinect Triple Bundle: Beats & Booms & Squids
summary:
Save big time and get three awesome Kinect games!

Work up a sweat in Beatsplosion, get in the flow while smashing bricks in Boom Ball, and embark upon a colorful arcade adventure in Squid Hero.

With three different games to choose from, every member of the family is sure to find their favorite.

Daily use may result in getting seriously fit!

name: Killing Floor
summary:
The original iteration of Killing Floor, which was released as an Unreal Tournament 2004 total conversion mod in 2005 by Shatterline Productions.

Like the future retail editions of the series, it is a co-op survival horror game against waves of specimen from the Horzine corporation...

Early versions of the mod included a short story mode, which was removed in later versions. Version 2.5 was the final version of the mod before the retail release of Killing Floor, though fans did later release up to Version 2.52.

name: King Island 3
summary: Embark on the final chapter of the King Island Franchise and venture into new depths, discover the Lost City and encounter Lola the Enchantress, you are no longer alone, Kaptivo!

name: Kitchen Confidence
summary: Kitchen Confidence is a restaurant simulation game, with a pinch of humour. The player will get to manage different kinds of kitchens, and to open the restaurant of their dreams.

name: Kingdom Square
summary: A tile-based minimalist city-building and automation game set in the middle ages.

name: Kingdom Islands
summary: Kingdom Islands is a medieval city-building game, where you construct a prosperous city on a distant island. As your village expands and your people begin to develop their knowledge of the land, you may explore and visit new areas of the known world.

name: Kimmie Jong on Nukes the World
summary: What happens when a fictitious, third world dictator discovers advanced, Atlantean technology? He tries to nuke the world, of course. Help Kimmie Jong On survive the labyrinths of the Artificial Sentient System, A.S.S., and achieve his goal of eliminating all the nuclear powers of the world.

name: Kickball
summary: A comedic baseball game in which players kick the incoming ball before running the bases.

name: King of Hearts
summary: King of Hearts: a dark, intricate fantasy kingdom sim. You're the lone human amidst enigmatic creatures. Build a realm, face divergent desires, manage advisors and your psyche. No knights in shining armor—just shadows, secrets, and tough choices. Can you rule when happiness is uncertain?

name: Kickman
summary: In Kickman, you are a unicycle riding clown! Your job? Catch all the balloons on your head, without dropping any. Kickman was originally released as simply "Kick." Later versions of the game came with a "Kickman" marquee, presumably in an attempt to capitalize on the popularity of Pac-Man, who appeared in the game.

name: Kick Rider
summary: Racing game in which you can kick your opponents from their bikes in order to get the lead.

name: Kingslayer: The First Assassin
summary: A different Sokoban style game where you have limited grid-movement and attacks in each level. Feel like an assassin in this minimalist puzzle.

name: Kiaidan 00
summary: Kiaidan 00 is a shoot'em up for PC Engine.

name: King of Casino
summary: The chips are down as you and your buddies travel to Vegas in this high stakes adventure. Match wits (and luck!) against the house or up to four of your friends in a game with all the glitz and glamor of a real casino. Play Poker, Blackjack, slot machines, Keno or Roulette. Choose one of 15 different casinos. You're the odds-on favorite in this high-rolling gambling simulation.

name: Killon
summary: Killon is a vertical scrolling shooter that features exhilarating combat and a special cannon waiting to be unleashed. Fly a Star ship across a universe in chaos and restore the future today.

name: Kings of Leon Revenge
summary: A Tap Tap Revenge game featuring Kings of Leon songs.

name: King Pong
summary: Welcome to the epic world of Ping Pong! An 80s Tron-like atmosphere, Ultis to make your opponents pale, ultra stylish characters, simple and effective game play, procedural electro music.

name: Kill Shot
summary: Kill Shot

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam
summary: A shoot 'em up game, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in 1983 in Japan.

name: Kickflip Quake
summary:
Kickflip Quake was a popular, humorous modification early in the Quake modding scene, inspired by Tony Hawk Pro Skater, and allowed for online co-op play.

Also included were numerous "skate" maps.

Its creator, Micheal Büttner, as well as the mod, were featured in the Video Game Museum, which acknowledged the "Beginning of Modding".

name: Kingdom Defense
summary: In Kingdom Defense you have to be in the role of the commander of the defense of the kingdom. You will have to keep defense using three towers, soldiers, traps and a variety of improvements for them. For a successful level you need to hold out under the pressure of hostile troops, not allowing him to get to the territory of the kingdom.

name: Kings' Cross
summary: KINGS' CROSS a unique mix of STRATEGY, RPG and TOWER DEFENSE. It delivers quick-fire, tactical combat balanced with customization of your hero, army and planning your way to win.

name: Kill Bill
summary: This Blood mapset contained three levels and was the author, Zik's, first add-on.

name: Kinetic Storm
summary: Defeat waves of enemies in this action-packed twin stick shooter. After every wave upgrade your ship to customize your build.

name: Kitten Sanctuary
summary: A match-3 pet simulation game in which aliens have trapped kittens in special cages with scrumptious treats. Free trapped kittens and keep them safe in your kitten sanctuaries.

name: Kitty Maestro
summary:
You play as a cat-composer traveling around the city of Petropolis looking for inspiration. You collect and construct riffs of music to complete an Oh-Puss that will be performed at the magnificent Meowditorium. 
 
Inspired by classic video games and retro games, Kitty Maestro features randomly generated, accurate music as part of a meowtastic monochromatic arcade game set in a city of cats.

name: King of Drop
summary: It is a game that drops from the top to the bottom platform. The timing of tapping the screen to fall to the next platform is important. You can also skip several. Only you can choose.

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam Seed
summary: Kidou Senshi Gundam Seed is an Action game, developed and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Kidou Senshi Gundam Part 2: Tobe Gundam
summary: Kidou Senshi Gundam Part 2: Tobe! Gundam (機動戦士ガンダム PART 2 翔べ！ガンダム "Mobile Suit Gundam Part 2: Fly! Gundam") is an adventure/shooter/RPG from 1984, based on the Mobile Suit Gundam anime series. It anticipated several gameplay elements later found in FPS, TPS and action RPG games.

name: Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2
summary: Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 was an unreleased Kirby game and a planned sequel to Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble, and it would have have been played on the Nintendo GameCube and Game Boy Advance at the same time. This was made possible by using the Game Boy Advance as a game controller via the link cable. As its name suggests, Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 was planned to feature the tilt controls that appeared in its predecessor. Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 was originally scheduled for a May 2002 release for Japan, but the Kirby theme was eventually scrapped. Kirby Tilt 'n' Tumble 2 was reintroduced as a game starring an ordinary marble, titled Roll-O-Rama; this version was shown at E3 2002 but was ultimately cancelled itself.

name: Kiss Yori... Seaside Serenade
summary: Kiss Yori... Seaside Serenade is an Adventure game, developed and published by Kid, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Kitten Cannon!
summary: Kitten Cannon! is a 2005 game by BurstStudio. It is widely credited with popularizing the "Toss" genre on Newgrounds.

name: Kitsuni
summary: Atmospheric Exploration Game Made for Ludum Dare

name: Kingdoms In Chaos
summary: Kingdoms In Chaos is an open world faction PVP MMO. Influenced by old school MMO's like Ultima Online. Choose from 4 race and battle for Brittania's riches! Travel anywhere, Hunt, Explore, Quest or form a war party and destroy your enemies. Form a guild and become Lord of a town!

name: Kitten Adventures in City Park
summary:
It's hard to be a kitten if you have such a clumsy owner! Yesterday she lost a lot of things in the park and now it's up to you to find them! 
Memories of that day can be helpful – you should remember where have you seen that thing last and search there. And finally you can climb up a tree and ask a big cat for a hint – you will see all the events of that day again.

name: Kingdom of Assetia: The Clicker Game
summary: In Kingdom of Assetia: The Clicker Game you'll be assuming the role of the Mayor of Anywhere. After a disastrous flood hit the former prime adventuring hub you'll be working on restoring the village.

name: Kimi no Yusha
summary: A SNK playmore developed Nintendo DS exclusive JRPG title released in 2008.

name: Kinectimals Mobile
summary: The hit Xbox 360 virtual pet game comes to mobile.

name: Kid Monkey: Banana Frenzy
summary:
When all his bananas were nabbed by a horde of fruit-stealing critters, Kid Monkey goes on a perilous quest to get back what's his, and then some!

Spit out seeds to grow your own platforms and jump pads. Grab the Big Banana, and collect as many small ones as you can along the way. A dozen carefully crafted levels will test the extent of your platforming skills.

But before you jump in, ask yourself this simple question:

Are you monkey enough to go on this Banana Frenzy?

name: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo: Akuma no Satsujin Koukai
summary: Kindaichi Shonen no Jikenbo: Akuma no Satsujin Koukai is a Adventure video game published by Creative core released on September 17, 2009 for the Nintendo DS.

name: Kids on Site
summary:
Remember the days as a kid when you were fascinated with these big machines on the building site? With this game you have the opportunity to try them out! You can use either the excavator, bulldozer, steamroller or wrecking ball. The handling couldn't be easier, there are just three buttons to press: left, right and use.

With each machine you get a simple task, e.g. carry three shovels of dirt on a truck. But the fun thing is that you aren't restricted to this and can just screw around. Why wreck an old house when the pit latrine is so much more tempting? The whole game is presented in full motion video - the reactions are very humorous and with a fair share of slapstick.
